Dec 22 (Reuters) -

  • AMAZON LIMITS HOW MANY COVID TESTS YOU CAN BUY AMID OMICRON SURGE - CNBC

  • AMAZON HAS LIMITED THE NUMBER OF PURCHASES OF ITS OWN AT-HOME PCR TEST KIT TO 10 UNITS PER SHOPPER- CNBC
